typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	cols as string[]
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 derive(last_update_tmstp = currentUTC()) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		source_table as string,
		dest_table as string,
		source_path as string,
		target_path as string,
		flow_sequence as string,
		run_status as string,
		qstring as string,
		watermark_col as string,
		watermark_val as string,
		key_column as string,
		source_name as string,
		load_type as string,
		start_run as string,
		source_id as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:($cols),
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	df_schema as string,
	df_table as string,
	ds_folder as string,
	df_watermark_col as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat($ds_folder,'/*.parquet'))]) ~> source1
source1 derive(last_update_tmstp = currentUTC()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		source_table as string,
		dest_table as string,
		source_path as string,
		target_path as string,
		flow_sequence as string,
		run_status as string,
		qstring as string,
		watermark_col as string,
		watermark_val as string,
		key_column as string,
		source_name as string,
		load_type as string,
		start_run as string,
		source_id as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	preSQLs:[(" TRUNCATE TABLE {$df_schema}.{$df_table}")],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from ',pipeline().parameters.ctbl_schema,'.',pipeline().parameters.ctbl_name, ' where  trigger_segment= ''', pipeline().parameters.trigger_segment,''' and start_run=''Y'' and load_type =''', pipeline().parameters.p_load_type,''' and flow_sequence=2 and run_status =''N''')

activities.name: Stored procedure update run status true
Stored procedure update run status false

dependsOn.activity: Stored procedure update run status true

ifFalseActivities.name: update watermark in history fs 2 record
SP update watermark in current fs 1 record

dependsOn.activity: update watermark in history fs 2 record

folder.name: Ingestion patterns Sql db to Synapse/History
Ingestion patterns Sql db to Synapse/Incremental

cntrl_table_his_grp_column.defaultValue: CONCAT(EXTRACT(YEAR  FROM BLNG_DT), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date))

cntrl_table_qstring.defaultValue: select year(date) his_grp_column, COUNT(*) CNT from schema.tablename

folder.name: Ingestion patterns Sql db to Synapse/History

dependsOn.activity: Stored procedure update run status true

ifTrueActivities.name: Stored procedure to update ADLS log

dependsOn.activity: Stored procedure to update ADLS log

ifTrueActivities.name: Stored procedure update run status true
Stored procedure update run status false

folder.name: Ingestion patterns Sql db to Synapse/Incremental
